bibl.title: Letter from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, February 11, 1915

div1.p: Blue orders Carter to lecture on yellow fever and malaria.

div1.head: Letter from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, February 11, 1915
div1.opener:
JKC
OFFICE OF THE SURGEON GENERAL
IN REPLYING
ADDRESS THE SURGEON GENERAL
U. S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
TREASURY DEPARTMENT
BUREAU OF
THE PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
WASHINGTON
February 11, 1915.
WMT
Senior Surgeon Henry R. Carter,
U. S. Marine Hospital,
Baltimore, Maryland.
Sir:
div1.p:
You are hereby detailed to present three lectures
to student-officers at the Hygienic Laboratory at
convenient dates, upon the subjects of yellow fever
and malaria. Upon the completion of the duty in each
case, you will rejoin your station at Baltimore, Md.
div1.closer:
Respectfully, Rupert Blue
Surgeon-General. cool
JW
The expenses incurred in carrying out the foregoing
instructions are hereby authorized.
B R Newton
Assistant Secretary.
R B
✓
